posts.post_title: WTB: T200 Fatima Cleveland, Detroit, Boston Nationals
posts.post_content:
Lower grade ok as long as decent eye appeal.
tbob

Bob,

I know it's a ways off(Sept) but the next B&L Auction will have all three of those, plus several more, all being offered individually.

Scott

Thanks Scott. If I don't pick them up before then, I'll definitely be bidding.
Bob
